document_data.mainbody:
Ihre was a Netherese arcanist and cleric who lived in Karsus Enclave before .
Ihre came to the aid of his adventurer friend Yousouf when he was cleaved by an ogre, mauled by a mountain lion, and frostbitten by the cold. Ihre managed to keep him alive and restore his health, but most of Yousoufs toes had to be removed before they became gangrenous.
